title: Kaito Ã— Ansa
overview: In five hours, the city of Tachikawa will disappear. Two men are chosen to be "Q Formers" heroes. The hot-blooded man who loves Tachikawa, Kaito Aen and his best friend Ansa Arishin. Together, along with senior Q Former Tokine Amino and Genki JK's Hyuga Takaragawa, they'll release the energy from the "Q Stone" to save Tachikawa.
